item.title: Live updates: Senate passes Trump-backed funding bill, averting a government shutdown
item.description: The latest news on President Donald Trump’s administration and the expected Senate vote on a continuing resolution to avert a government shutdown.

item.title: Trump moves to close facility that helps track planet-warming pollution
Arlington Cemetery website scrubs links about Black and female veterans
Trump visits Justice Department for speech that breaks all norms
item.description: Donald Trump railed against the federal prosecutions he once faced during a rare presidential visit to the Justice Department.

item.title: Raskin says Trump’s speech was ‘desecration’ of Justice Dept.’s values
